Patients complete single dose assessment M-T412 may receive 3 additional single dose M-T412 IV 2 hour , repeat dose give least 1 month apart . Then , patient receive one dose level M-T412 IV 2 hour 3 month interval period 12 month total 5 dos . Once recovery CD4 cell obtain , next schedule infusion M-T412 begin . Patients omit study CD4 cell remain attenuated follow 2 scheduled infusion session . Patients follow 3 , 6 , 12 , 24 month first infusion .
